section.heading: Addition to tax in the case of valuation understatement

content.p:
For purposes of this section, the applicable percentage shall be
determined under the following table:

 less than fifty percent ................... twenty
 less than forty percent ................... thirty

For purposes of this section, there is a valuation understatement
if the claimed value of any property is sixty-six and two-thirds percent
or less of the amount determined to be the correct amount of such
valuation.
This section shall not apply if the underpayment is less than one\nthousand dollars with respect to the estate of the decedent.\n

The commissioner may waive all or any part of the addition to tax
provided by this section on showing by the executor that there was a
reasonable basis for the claimed valuation and that such claim was made
in good faith.
